name: PARTNERSHIP FOR CLEAN ENERGY INVESTMENT
description: Coalition to educate lawmakers on clean energy investments
sampleDescriptions:
Advocacy work in support of direct pay option for the wind and solar PTC/ITC.
S. 985 - Save Americas Clean Energy Jobs Act and H.R. 3180 - The Renewable Energy Investment Act.
